english.segment1: Rock of Ages, cleft for me, Let me hide myself in Thee;. Let the water and the blood, From Thy riven side which flowed, Be of sin the double cure;. Cleanse me from its guilt and power.
english.segment2: Nothing in my hand I bring, Simply to the cross I cling;. Naked, come to Thee for dress;. Helpless look to Thee for grace;. Foul, I to the fountain fly;. Wash me, Savior, or I die.
